page.title: 08Burnthurst Wood Farm
page.content: Burnthurst Farm is presently owned by Mr.Campion.The farm was built 200 years ago,and the family have lived there for 40 years.Mr.Campion has 115 acres of land,17 fields and Forest Wood part of Ryton Wood (Warnact).Mr. Campion rents his fields out between April to October.They are grazed by in calf Fresian cows.In October Mr. Campion buys in 50 sheep to fatten and clear the fields until December.In 1974 Mr.Campion retired as an active farmer,but enjoys shepherding the visiting stock.Although the farm buildings are no longer in use Mr.Campion employs a man two mornings a week to maintain and repair them and secure the fences on the farm.There is an extensive vegetable garden and orchard.Mr.Campion possesses some intresting documents relating to the farm from the time of George 111.
